General.Name: Heilongjiang Transport Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Heilongjiang Transport Development Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment, development, construction, operation, and management of toll roads in China. The company primarily operates and manages Harbin-Dalian expressway with a total length of 132.664 kilometers. It also provides taxi services; develops and operates real estate properties; invests in, manages, and operates road service areas and refueling stations, as well as leases billboards; and manufactures and sells plastic pipes, pipe fittings, and pipeline products are mainly used in municipal construction, sewage treatment, agricultural irrigation, railway road bridges and culverts, pharmaceuticals, printing and dyeing, nuclear power, thermal power, reclamation docks, mine tailings discharge, and other fields. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Harbin, China.
General.Address: No. 1688, Qunli Fifth Avenue, Harbin, China, 150070
